User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://bubblesenterprise.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow crawling of admin or private areas (if any)
# Disallow: /admin/
# Disallow: /private/

# Allow crawling of important pages
Allow: /calculator
Allow: /about
Allow: /services
Allow: /contact

# Crawl-delay (optional, helps with server load)
Crawl-delay: 1
